sentence: it is perfect for tourists and perfect for anyone who wants entertainment surrounding them
The location of the resort is great right on Patong Beach minutes from Bangla Soi the walkers street with its hundreds of bars Jungceylon Mall and all the shopping restaurants and massage places
Close to Food Mall cheap western and asian food
The staff were helpful and friendly and there was lots in the way of nightlife near the airport
We stayed here for a week and the location was perfect to Patong Beach and its nightlife
The hotel is conveniently located near the beach and near the nice mall as well as other parts of Patong Beach

The location is perfect just opposite the beach and is very convenient for taxi tuktuk nearby is jungceylon shopping mall and the famous walking street Bangla road and our most favourite restaurant IC Indian curry clubRecomended to all to come and stay at this fantastic resort
Close to the beach and shopping mall
15min walk to Jungceylon Patongs most modern air conditioned shopping mall similar to Bugis Junction shopping centre in Singapore
The famous shopping mall is also near by
Walking distance to Jungceylon mall
pubs too with a sounds of live country western music egyptian music and karaoke
Not only the Beach but even shopping was also a walk away which include Jugceylon Shopping Mall and other leisure destinations
close to the beach the bars restaurants and nightlife and yet far enough from them to not be disturbed by the din
The jungceylon shopping mall can be accessible by walking
Halal food is also easy to find around that area eg across the street at Atop market in Jungceylon mall so do n’t worry
Jungcelon Shopping Mall was about 15 20 mins walk from the hotel
Just a small street crossing away from the beach and surrounded by amazing nightlife

There are many restaurants around the resort many food stands money exchange places travel agencies we used one in the resort as we totally trusted them shopping mall is about 10 minutes ’ walk I personally did n’t find anything in the mall that would be worth to go back 2nd time and of course many bars and large selection of all kinds of entertainment places – but
There have alot of activities for the kids and this give us a few hours off either for a massage or some shopping at the mall
Far from bangla road and shopping mall
